p: Moreover, Fern et al. [ 127] also reported that the leaves of P. arboreum are taken as a remedy after overeating or in the case of stomach poisoning. A decoction or cold water infusion of P. arboreum leaves is used to treat body aches and fevers while the warmed leaves are used as a poultice around joints to relieve arthritic pains and topically around affected area as a treatment for aches, pains and strains. Moreover, the macerated leaves and stems are used as anti-venom.
